sections.purpose: To store drugs, reagents, and biological materials at precise temperature control.
sections.scope: Applicable to temperature-sensitive material storage in pharmacology.
procedure: Set the cabinet to the required temperature range.
Allow stabilization and verify with independent thermometer.
Organize materials with proper labeling and inventory.
Clean interior surfaces monthly with approved disinfectants.
precautions: Do not overload to ensure air circulation.
Use data loggers for continuous monitoring.
